text: @jenroy1212 #VEDay street party today in my area. Once booze flows, social distancing will be a distant memory. Talk of easing lockdown before guidelines are issued has had the effect of easing lockdown. He has learnt zero from a with a dice #COVID19 he is an utter buffoon. #London #PMQs
